```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)

# Create scatter plots with red regression lines for TV, radio, and newspaper
plot_tv <- ggplot(Advertising, aes(x = TV, y = Sales)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, color = "red") +
  labs(title = "TV vs. Sales", x = "TV Budget (thousands of dollars)", y = "Sales (thousands of units)") +
  theme_minimal()

plot_radio <- ggplot(Advertising, aes(x = Radio, y = Sales)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, color = "red") +
  labs(title = "Radio vs. Sales", x = "Radio Budget (thousands of dollars)", y = "Sales (thousands of units)") +
  theme_minimal()

plot_newspaper <- ggplot(Advertising, aes(x = Newspaper, y = Sales)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, color = "red") +
  labs(title = "Newspaper vs. Sales", x = "Newspaper Budget (thousands of dollars)", y = "Sales (thousands of units)") +
  theme_minimal()

# Arrange plots side by side in a single line
plot_grid(plot_tv, plot_radio, plot_newspaper, labels = "AUTO", ncol = 3)
```
